item.description:
The Town of Arlington's Recreation Department runs their spring tennis programs at Crosby until June so we will be relocating to Dugger Park.

As the weather warms up, the Meetups will be scheduled to an earlier time (eventually to 8:30 AM). However, since it's still fairly cold, hopefully with the later start time, the sun has warmed up the day a bit.

Weekend Meetups are informal and unstructured - show up and play with whoever else shows up. Open to all levels.

Please contact Susan (Asst Organizer) if you are interested in becoming a regular Meetup host. Thanks.
item.name: Sat AM @ Dugger
